conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall heights and cutaway structure.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D transformation with accurate wall thickness and clear floor separation. Standard orthographic-isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout reproduction. Room counts and adjacencies match the 2D plan perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout very closely, including kitchen appliances and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: High geometry clarity. Points deducted for text labels in the 3D space which creates visual clutter.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are superimposed onto the 3D floor plane, affecting presentation clarity.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric adherence to the original floor plan layout and furniture arrangement.
